text: It's a terribly hard job to spend a billion dollars and get your money's worth.
author: George M. Humphrey

text: A successful man is one who makes more money than his wife can spend. A successful woman is one who can find such a man.
author: Lana Turner

text: A nation that continues year after year to spend more money on military defense than on programs of social uplift is approaching spiritual doom.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

text: The glow of one warm thought is to me worth more than money.
author: Thomas Jefferson

text: Friends and good manners will carry you where money won't go.
author: Margaret Walker
